member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio
member.summary: A CellularRadio module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio.PowerOn(System.Int32)
member.summary: Power on the CellularRadio module.
member.param: Time, in seconds, to allow the supercapacitor on the CellularRadio module to charge up before turning on. Recommended time is 40 seconds from a cold start.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio.PowerOn
member.summary: Power on the CellularRadio module.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio.PowerOff
member.summary: Powers off the Cellular Radio module

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Instantiates a Cellular Radio Module
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio.SendATCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Sends an AT command to the Cellular Radio Module. It automatically appends the carriage return.
member.param: String containing the AT command. See SIM900_ATC_V1.00 for reference.
member.returns: ReturnedState.OK - Command was sent ReturnedState.ModuleIsOff - Module is off ReturnedState.Error - Serial line is not open ReturnedState.InvalidCommand - Invalid AT command

member.summary: SIM is waiting for second PIN

member.summary: SIM is waiting for second PUK

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio.PINState.NotPresent
member.summary: SIM is not present

member.summary: Possible states for a text message

member.summary: Messages that were received and read

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio.SmsState.ReceivedRead
member.summary: Messages that were received but not yet read

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.Seeed.CellularRadio.SmsState.All

member.summary: Ringer is active

member.summary: Active voice all
